io.hekate.metrics.local

Class LocalMetricsServiceFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.hekate.metrics.local.LocalMetricsServiceFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceFactory<LocalMetricsService>

    public class LocalMetricsServiceFactory
extends Object
implements ServiceFactory<LocalMetricsService>
    Factory for LocalMetricsService.

    This class represents a configurable factory for LocalMetricsService. Instances of this class can be registered within the HekateBootstrap in order to customize options of the LocalMetricsService.

    For more details about the LocalMetricsService and its capabilities please see the documentation of LocalMetricsService interface.

    See Also:
    LocalMetricsService

        Returns the time interval in milliseconds to poll for metric changes and listeners notification (see setRefreshInterval(long)).
        Returns:
        Time interval in milliseconds.

      • setRefreshInterval

        public void setRefreshInterval(long refreshInterval)
        Sets the time interval in milliseconds to poll for metric changes and listeners notification.

        Value of this parameter must be above zero. Default value is 1000.

        Parameters:
        refreshInterval - Time interval in milliseconds.

      • setSystemTime

        public void setSystemTime(SystemTimeSupplier systemTime)
        Returns the system time supplier for time-based metrics.

        This property is optional and is intended to be used for testing purposes for system time emulation.

        Parameters:
        systemTime - System time supplier.
